HS boys are awful. They're just awful. And we all suffered because of them. But where are they today? They're all #winning. Because that's how American society works.

But it's never left me. What became of her? I know how the boys turned out - they all went on fabulous careers and fun lives. But I'll never forget how they laughed about taking advantage of her. How awful that we had to live through that. #rapeculture

I vividly recall standing outside school waiting for buses, and looking at her with both sorrow & scorn. None of us said anything comforting to her. None of us scolded the boys who were bragging about the conquest. None of us told a teacher. We swallowed it, b/c of the culture

THREAD: To Men who don't understand why women are so depressed today: It's because we've all been treated disrespectfully by boys just like Mark and Brett. One of my most vivid memories from HS class of '85 is a girl who boys bragged they had drugged and taken turns with. /1
